title: Connection Error
body: Hey guys I've been having this problem lately and need some help. Sometimes when I try to queue into a game it would say connection timeout the request to the PVP.net server timed out. Is there a way to fix this if so please tell me.

replies.body:
PvP.net connection errors are generally caused by an unstable or poor connection to the servers. These are most often caused by either local network configurations that clash with League or in unreliable routing to the server. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common fixes and is a great place to start in troubleshooting. 

Let me know if this helped out.
Thanks man it helped, I can play again
